refnamediv.refpurpose: convert Applicon files to pix files

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: ap-pix converts an Applicon drum plotter image file into a pix5 file.
The Applicon file is assumed to consist of a number lines each 3456 bits long; the resulting pix file thus has scanlines of 3456 pixels.
